item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。特斯拉计划最快在今年推出廉价汽车，股价因此大涨；Meta 将公布财报；国债拍卖再创新高。索菲亚-奥尔塔-科斯塔（Sofia Horta e Costa）想收到本新闻通讯的西班牙语版本吗？注册获取 Five Things：西班牙语版时事通讯。【原文：Good morning. Tesla’s shares soar on its plans to roll out cheaper cars as soon as this year, Meta is set to report earnings and there’s another record Treasury auction coming up. Here’s what people are talking about. — Sofia Horta e CostaWant to receive this newsletter in Spanish? Sign up to get the Five Things: Spanish Edition newsletter.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官表示 "乐意 "提供卢旺达驱逐航班
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）对英国有争议的将难民驱逐到卢旺达的计划发表了看法，称如果他有可用的飞机，他会 "很乐意 "执行这些航班。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Michael O’Leary weighed into the UK’s controversial plan to deport refugees to Rwanda, saying he would “happily” do the flights if he had the available aircraft.】

item.title: 农作物贸易商抵御经济下滑，邦吉公司利润超预期
item.description: 农业综合企业巨头邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）称，由于谷物价格下降和整个行业压榨利润率收紧，该公司第一季度盈利降幅低于预期。【原文：Bunge Global SA said first-quarter earnings fell less than expected as the agribusiness giant weathers a decline in grain prices and tighter crushing profit margins across the industry.】

item.title: 印尼加息可能不足以刺激印尼盾反弹
item.description: 分析师和策略师认为，印尼央行的加息可能有助于抑制印尼盾的短期疲软，但不足以刺激印尼盾反弹。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s interest-rate hike may help curb any short-term weakness in the rupiah but is not enough to spur a rally in the currency, according analysts and strategists.】

item.title: CVC和Puig首次公开募股将检验欧洲IPO反弹的力度
item.description: 欧洲首次公开募股反弹的迹象开始逐渐显现，两家大公司的首次公开募股将决定未来的发展方向。【原文：Evidence of a rebound in Europe’s initial public offerings is starting to trickle in, with two big-ticket debuts set to determine the path ahead.】

item.title: 欧佩克向非洲石油勘探热点纳米比亚提供支持
item.description: 石油输出国组织承诺帮助纳米比亚成为重要的原油生产国，为这个南部非洲国家加入该卡特尔拓宽了道路。【原文：The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries pledged to help Namibia become a significant crude producer, widening a path for the southern African nation to join the cartel.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟医疗器械调查是向保护主义迈出的一步
item.description: 中国批评欧盟对医疗器械制造商的市场准入展开调查的决定，称此举试图打压中国公司。【原文：China criticized the European Union’s decision to launch a probe into market access for medical-device makers, saying the move is an attempt to suppress Chinese companies.】

item.title: 印度投票之际，莫迪加紧攻击反对党的福利计划
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）使用批评者认为在印度教多数派和穆斯林少数派之间制造分裂的语言，加倍抨击主要反对党。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi doubled down on his attacks against the main opposition party by using language critics say sows division between the country’s Hindu majority and Muslim minority.】

item.title: 中国要求经纪商限制 "滚雪球 "式衍生品的风险敞口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在股市大跌之后，经纪商将收益率提高到接近创纪录的水平，以吸引投资者购买 "滚雪球 "式的衍生产品，中国正在采取行动遏制这种行为。【原文：China is moving to curb “snowball” derivatives after brokers hiked returns to near-record levels to attract investors to the risky products following a stock-market selloff, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官敦促波音公司在危机期间继续保持领导力
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）表示，波音公司管理层在寻求稳定业务的过程中需要注重连续性，而商用飞机部门的新负责人已经有了一个良好的开端。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Michael O’Leary said Boeing Co. management needs to focus on continuity as it seeks to stabilise the business, and that the new head of the commercial aircraft unit has made a promising start.】

item.title: Investcorp 成立由中国中投公司支持的 10 亿美元中东基金
item.description: 中东最大的另类资产管理公司正在设立一个由北京主权财富基金支持的 10 亿美元投资工具，投资于波斯湾和中国的公司。【原文：The Middle East’s biggest alternative asset manager is setting up a $1 billion investment vehicle backed by Beijing’s sovereign wealth fund to invest in companies across the Persian Gulf and China.】

item.title: 瑞银集团主席表示严重关注资本改革
item.description: 瑞银集团主席科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）说，瑞士政府要求瑞银大幅增加资本的建议，是对一年多前导致瑞士信贷倒闭的失误的 "错误补救"。【原文：UBS Chairman Colm Kelleher said that the Swiss government’s proposal to require the bank to hold substantially more capital is the “wrong remedy” to the failings that brought down Credit Suisse over a year ago.】

item.title: BCG 今年净招聘 2,000 人，不惧咨询业低迷
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）今年将增加 2000 多名员工，以应对行业增长放缓带来的最大公司裁员潮。【原文：Boston Consulting Group is set to grow by more than 2,000 employees this year, defying an industry slowdown that’s seen the biggest firms slash jobs.】

item.title: 随着经济复苏，德国商业前景创一年新高
法国电网问题导致欧洲电价飙升
item.description: 法国部分地区的电网限制制约了电力出口，从而推高了邻国的电价。【原文：Grid limitations in parts of France are constraining power exports, pushing up prices in neighboring countries.】

item.title: 日本生命稳步购买 30 年期日本政府债券
item.description: 日本生命保险公司计划购买超长期日本国债，并将在 30 年期国债收益率大幅升至 2% 以上时加快购买速度。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. plans to buy super-long Japanese government bonds and will accelerate purchases when the 30-year yield rises significantly above 2%.】

item.title: 意大利 "超级红利 "债务引起惠誉关注
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，意大利重回债务上升的轨道有可能使管理欧元区第三大经济体的任务复杂化，并可能激化政治紧张局势。【原文：Italy’s return to a trajectory of rising debt risks complicating the task of managing the euro zone’s third-biggest economy and could stoke political tensions, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 古驰（Gucci）业绩下滑引发盈利警告，开云集团股价下跌
item.description: 奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering SA）警告称，由于其最大品牌古驰（Gucci）销售下滑，今年上半年利润将大幅下滑，该集团股价随之暴跌。【原文：Kering SA shares tumbled after the luxury group warned that profit will plunge in the first half of the year on slumping sales at Gucci, its biggest brand.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行首次降息不必启动系列降息行动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行无法对 6 月份可能首次降低借贷成本后的情况做出承诺。【原文：The European Central Bank can’t commit to what will happen after a likely first reduction in borrowing costs in June, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 管理资产增加，资金净流入 Abrdn
item.description: Abrdn Plc 报告称，今年第一季度客户资金流入，管理资产增加，表明这家陷入困境的资金管理公司业绩有所改善。【原文：Abrdn Plc reported client inflows and an uptick in assets under management during the first quarter of the year, signaling an improvement in performance at the troubled money manager.】

item.title: 中国科技前景看好，腾讯股价超越七大巨头
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司的股价本月已飙升超过 10%，跑赢了 "华丽七巨头"，凸显出全球投资者对中国价值被低估的超级大盘股的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Shares of Tencent Holdings Ltd. have surged more than 10% this month, outperforming the Magnificent Seven and underscoring global investors’ growing appetite for China’s undervalued megacaps.】

item.title: 阿布扎比三年来首次发行欧洲债券融资 50 亿美元
item.description: 阿布扎比出售了自 2021 年以来的首批欧元债券，在今年新兴市场最大的一笔交易中筹集了 50 亿美元。【原文：Abu Dhabi sold its first eurobonds since 2021, raising $5 billion in one of the biggest deals from emerging markets this year.】

item.title: 普拉博沃的助手称印尼不需要再次加息
item.description: 当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的一位经济顾问表示，印尼央行不需要进一步提高利率来保护印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia doesn’t need to further increase interest rates to shield the rupiah, according to an economic advisor of President-elect Prabowo Subianto who sought a monetary policy that’s supportive of growth.】

item.title: 埃尼集团利用强劲现金流将股票回购规模提高至 16 亿欧元
item.description: 由于现金流更加充裕，埃尼公司（Eni SpA）将今年的股票回购计划提高到 16 亿欧元（17 亿美元），同时公布的第一季度利润符合预期。【原文：Eni SpA increased its planned share buyback this year to €1.6 billion ($1.7 billion) due to stronger cash flow, while reporting profit in the first quarter that met estimates.】

item.title: 法国债务持续攀升，信用评级面临考验
item.description: 即将进行的三项评级评估将考验法国的债券市场，使人们关注法国日益恶化的债务状况。【原文：A trio of upcoming rating assessments is set to test France’s bond markets by turning the spotlight on the country’s worsening debt picture.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：期货指向第六天上涨
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所。【原文：The London Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 全球最大能源交易商重返金属市场
item.description: 世界上一些最大的能源贸易公司在经历了众所周知的市场困境多年后，正在重返金属市场。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest energy trading companies are returning to metals, years after getting burnt in the notoriously difficult markets.】

item.title: 碧桂园延长债券期限以避免首次地方违约
item.description: 中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co., one of the biggest symbols of the nation’s broader property debt crisis, won approval to push back payments on three yuan bonds, people familiar with the matter said, staving off its first local default for now.】

item.title: 中国铜标尺归零向金属多头发出严正警告
item.description: 衡量中国铜需求的一个关键指标刚刚降至零，这再次表明全球价格与这个最大市场的买家准备支付的价格不平衡。【原文：A key measure of Chinese copper demand just sank to zero, another sign that global prices are not balanced with what buyers in the biggest market are prepared to pay.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】
